ygData.subject: Re: Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: To attempt to get the executioners axe, you have to be able to kill 4 spectres plus the executioner.....when you think you are ready, go try to kill the
ygData.messageBody:
To attempt to get the executioners axe, you have to be able to kill 4 spectres plus the executioner.....when you think you are ready, go try to kill the spectres in oasis, the whole tower, all 5. I say try in oasis because its a lot easier to run to the zone in oasis than it is in lower guk :) But level wise, you should have a nice group of mid to low 40s, or higher.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.24.99 2:00:33 AM >>>
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

This sounds more accurate, what level should someone attempt lower guk?
